item.title: Emacs Carnival 2025-07: Writing Experience
item.description: <2025-07-26 Sat> This is my contribution to the Emacs Carnival 2025-07: Writing Experience. For me the experience of writing in Emacs is a frequent, ever evolving, largely in org-mode, magical experience that has became critical for the way I operate. I use org-roam for capturing. I really like the ability to specify the template for a new file separately from the template to append to an existing file. This really helped me switch from a methodology centered around fewer larger files, to one centered around more smaller files.
